title: Rescue at Firebase Zeta
description: Extract Imperial Guard survivors from an overrun firebase. Time is running out.

scenes.name: Landing Zone
scenes.description: Your Thunderhawk sets down in a storm of fire. Firebase Zeta burns in the distance. Ork war cries echo across the battlefield.

events.text: 'Brethren, the Guard holds by a thread. We move fast. We move hard. For the Emperor!'

scenes.name: Firebase Perimeter
scenes.description: Shattered defenses. Bodies of Guardsmen and Orks litter the ground. Gunfire rattles from the command bunker.

events.text: Orks charge from the trenches! Cut them down!

scenes.name: Command Bunker
scenes.description: The last holdout. Wounded Guardsmen defend the entrance. Their commander salutes as you arrive.

events.text: 'Emperor's mercy! We're saved! But we can't hold much longerâ€”the Warboss is coming!'

scenes.name: Extraction Point
scenes.description: The extraction zone. But between you and safety stands the Ork Warboss and his elite guard.

events.text: The Warboss bellows a challenge. 'SPACE MARINE! COME FIGHT DA BIGGEST AND DA BEST!'

items.name: Relic Power Sword
items.description: An ancient blade crackling with energy. Cuts through armor like paper.

items.name: Combat Stimulants
items.description: Emergency medical boosters. For when the Emperor's work demands more.

npcs.name: Ork Mob
npcs.description: A group of savage greenskins. Crude but deadly.

npcs.name: Commander Graves
npcs.description: Veteran Guard officer. Wounded but unbowed.
dialogue: We've held for three days. Thought we were done for.
The men are ready to move on your command, my lord.

npcs.name: Warboss Skullkrakka
npcs.description: Massive Ork warlord. Covered in scars and trophies. Living legend of brutality.

npcs.name: Nob Bodyguard
npcs.description: Elite Ork warrior. Loyal to the Warboss unto death.

puzzles.name: Organize the Evacuation
puzzles.description: Coordinate the Guardsmen and plan the escape route.

solution.success_text: The wounded are stabilized. Formation ready. Now we fight our way out.
